00032 Parameterization ParameterizationAlphaA = {
00033   name : "AlphaA",
00034   Pararead : AlphaAread,
00035   Parawrite : AlphaAwrite,
00036   Paraclone : AlphaAclone,
00037   ParainitSlaterDet : AlphaAinitSlaterDet,
00038   ParatoSlaterDet : AlphaAtoSlaterDet,
00039   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : AlphaAprojectgradSlaterDet

00043 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00044 #define NGAUSS 6                
00045 
00046 
00047 void AlphaAclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00048 {
00049   int i;
00050 
00051   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00052   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00053   qp->n = q->n;
00054 
00055   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00056   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00057     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00058 
00059   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00060 
00061   // internals stores width a
00062   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(double));
00063   double* qpa = qp->internals;
00064   double* qa = q->internals;
00065   *qpa = *qa;
00066 }

00069 #define BUFSIZE 255
00070 
00071 int AlphaAread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00072 {
00073   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00074   int i;
00075 
00076 
00077   do
00078     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00079   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00080   if (feof(fp)) {
00081     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00082     return -1;
00083   }
00084   
00085   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00086 
00087   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00088   if (strcmp(Pname, "AlphaA")) {
00089     fprintf(stderr, "not a AlphaA parameter set\n");
00090     return -1;
00091   }
00092   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00093 
00094   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00095   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00096     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00097     return -1;
00098   }
00099   if (q->A != 2*q->Z || q->A != 2*q->N) {
00100     fprintf(stderr, "not an alpha nucleus in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00101             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00102     return -1;
00103   }
00104   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00105   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00106     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00107     return -1;
00108   }
00109 
00110   q->n = q->A/4*NGAUSS;
00111 
00112   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00113 
00114   double a, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00115 
00116   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00117   if (sscanf(buf, "%lf", &a) != 1) {      
00118     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00119             stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00120     return -1;
00121   }
00122   q->internals = malloc(sizeof(double));
00123   double* qa = q->internals;
00124   *qa = a;
00125 
00126   for (i=0; i<q->A/4; i++) {
00127     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00128     if (sscanf(buf, "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00129                &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 6) {
00130       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00131               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00132       return -1;
00133     }
00134     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = b0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = b0im;
00135     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = b1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = b1im;
00136     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = b2re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = b2im;
00137   }     
00138 
00139   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00140   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00141     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00142     return -1;
00143   }     
00144 
00145   return 0;
00146 }

00148 
00149 int AlphaAwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00150 {
00151   int i;
00152 
00153   fprintf(fp, "<Para AlphaA %s>\n", q->name);
00154   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00155   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00156   double *qa = q->internals;
00157   fprintf(fp, "%12.8f\n", *qa);
00158   for (i=0; i<q->A/4; i++)
00159     fprintf(fp,
00160             "(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00161             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1], 
00162             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
00163             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5]);
00164   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00165 
00166   return 0;
00167 }

00170 void AlphaAinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00171 {
00172   int k;
00173 
00174   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N;
00175   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00176 
00177   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00178   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00179     Q->idx[k] = k;
00180     
00181   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00182   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00183     Q->ng[k] = 1;
00184 
00185   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00186   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++) {
00187     Q->G[4*k+0].xi = 1; 
00188     Q->G[4*k+1].xi = 1; 
00189     Q->G[4*k+2].xi = -1; 
00190     Q->G[4*k+3].xi = -1; 
00191   }
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 void AlphaAtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00196 {
00197   int k, ki;
00198   double* qa = q->internals;
00199 
00200   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++)
00201     for (ki=0; ki<4; ki++) {
00202     Q->G[4*k+ki].chi[0] = ki % 2 ? 1 : 0;
00203     Q->G[4*k+ki].chi[1] = ki % 2 ? 0 : 1;
00204     Q->G[4*k+ki].a      = *qa;
00205     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[0]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 0]+I*q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 1];
00206     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[1]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 2]+I*q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 3];
00207     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[2]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 4]+I*q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 5];
00208   }
00209 }

00211 
00212 void AlphaAprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00213                                 const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00214 {
00215   int k, ki, i;
00216 
00217   // only converting a complex in a real gradient
00218 
00219   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++) {
00220     for (i=0; i<NGAUSS; i++)
00221       dq[k*NGAUSS+ i] = 0.0;
00222     for (ki=0; ki<4; ki++) {
00223       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 0] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[0]);
00224       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 1] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[0]);
00225       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 2] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[1]);
00226       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 3] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[1]);
00227       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 4] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[2]);
00228       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 5] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[2]);
00229     }
00230   }
00231 }
